ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Although I m a newbie here, I do have a quick suggestion.  Whenever I level I always spend about 10 - 15 minutes maxxing my stats before hunting if possible.
ygData.messageBody:
Although I'm a newbie here, I do have a quick suggestion. Whenever I level
I always spend about 10 - 15 minutes maxxing my stats before hunting if
possible. To do this I cast a pet and target it, then cast Disease Cloud
(10 mana Conjuration) and Siphon Strength (5 mana Alteration) at it until
both are maxxed. That way I know I'll do as well as possible for my level
in battle.

Hope this helps and isn't redundant information.

Alazzar

-----Original Message-----
From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 9:57 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)


From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>

Ok. Thanks for the info.

I was wondering because it seems that as I gain level (within a circle of
spells), toward the end of that circle I cast a higher level pet more often
than a lower level pet.
